Module AI.integration

Package org.example.ai_integration.model

package org.example.ai_integration.model
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.example.ai_integration
     
    org.example.ai_integration.controls
     
  • Class
    Description
    Database
    Utility class for handling database connections to the SQLite database.
    FileUtil
    Utility class for reading the content of files in different formats.
    IContactDAO
    Interface for the Contact Data Access Object that handles the CRUD operations for the Contact class with the database.
    Notes
    Model class for storing note information in the application.
    NotesAPI
    API utility class for handling note summaries with Gemini.
    NotesAPI.Content
    Inner class representing a note summary object returned from Gemini.
    NoteSummary
    Model class for storing summarized notes in the application.
    NoteSummaryManager
    Singleton manager class for handling the current NoteSummary.
    Quiz
    Model class for storing quiz information in the application.
    QuizAPI
    API utility class for generating and parsing quizzes with Gemini.
    QuizAPI.McqItem
    Model class representing a single multiple-choice question item.
    QuizLibrary
    Model class for managing quizzes stored in the database.
    QuizManager
    Manager class for handling quiz state across the application.
    Signup
    Handles the logic for signing up new users.
    SignupClass
    Represents a user signing up with personal details.
    User
    Represents a user of the application.
    UserManager
    Manages the currently logged-in user.
    UserStats
    Launches the User Statistics page of the application.
